dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5288 IH: Common Sense Credit Union Capital Relief Act of 2018
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Posey (for himself and Mr. Heck) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To delay the effective date of the rule issued by the National Credit Union Administration titled Risk-Based Capital.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Common Sense Credit Union Capital Relief Act of 2018.

Notwithstanding any effective date set forth in the rule issued by the National Credit Union Administration titled Risk-Based Capital (published at 80 Fed. Reg. 66626 (October 29, 2015)), such final rule shall take effect on January 1, 2021.
